dc_title_s: Tamil Nadu, India : Village Socio-Demographic and Economic Census Data, 2001
dc_description_s: This datalayer shows village locations with socio-demographic and economic Census data for 2001 for the state of Tamil Nadu, India. Includes village socio-demographic and economic Census attribute data such as total population, population by sex, household, literacy and illiteracy rates, and employment by industry. This layer is part of the VillageMap dataset which includes socio-demographic and economic Census data for 2001 at the village level for all the states of India. This data layer is sourced from secondary government sources, chiefly Survey of India, Census of India, Election Commission, etc. Scale 1:1,000,000.
